评论详情: The dress is well-made and is very comfortable. The color was great. I got the aqua blue.

Cute dress good material very stretchy. I ordered a large I’m 5’4 and 140LB it just doesn’t fit right and doesn’t look good on my body. The slit is smaller than what shows in the picture on the website unfortunately, I’m sending it back.
I’m buying a second one. It is great for a night out in Park City and is comfy enough for the airplane. Easy to dress it up.
Great quality, Too long. I returned this dress but would buy it again if it came in a petite size.
Ended up returning this because the fabric was not comfortable at all. Otherwise was a nice dress, but wouldn’t want to wear something so scratchy, especially in the heat.

I love the way the dress looks and fits! Color was what I expected. Only issue was the fabric was a little too heavy for what I like. Upside with the fabric thickness is no issues with being see through!
Bought this to wear in Italy and it was a hit. I’m only giving it 4 stars because the arm and chest area was a little big on me but the dress fit otherwise.
Great Quality ,it's not forgiving so wear your Spanx.
I love the color and the style.  It was heavy on my frame and didn’t fit well sadly.  I wanted to love it.  The color was pretty.

I love this dress. I am 5'1, 125-130lbs and the XS is perfect on me. I originally bought a size small, but the waist was a little baggy. However, I still wear the small with a sweater over top. The XS is perfect on it's own and SO incredibly flattering. The fabric is thick(ish) enough to smooth any area you want hidden. Cannot recommend this enough, this dress is perfect!
I didn't like how this dress fit me.  It really doesn't have any shape, not that flattering. It is a nice thick quality material.
Very soft yet figure flattering. Love it
I wanted to love this dress but the material was thick and felt like plastic. It was very uncomfortable and scratchy on my skin. It also bunched in unflattering ways. I had to return it.

I came in unsure on how I would like this, but I’m In love! I got the light blue and it’s so stunning, and fits very well:) I usually get an xs and I got an xxs ! The fit is good, not too tight at all. The material is like a ribbed sweater knit so it has a way of hugging your body right ! Since I’m 5 feet I was concerned how long it would be but in the xxs it hits around mid calf :) I already ordered it in navy too and I’m excited to wear this dress up or down, in the summer and in the fall
Gorgeous color red, nice lighter weight knit, nice fabric, not transparent. Very flattering cut and neckline. I am 5'5" and 130lbs. I love the versatility, you can easily dress it up or down.

Usually wear a large and ordered the medium. I still feel like it's too big, especially on top and I do not have a small chest. The material is almost too stretchy, looks weird after a while. I bought a bunch of different colors and unfortunately took all the tags off so I can't return them, but if you don't mind the fabric being a little rough, fit-wise they are very comfortable. just make sure you wear with a jacket, sometimes it stretches out so much the top of your bra may show. I would say order 1-2 sizes smaller.
Made good. Cute.

The fabric is thick enough that you don't have to worry about things showing through, but not heavy, so good for warm weather. I love the color and it looks GREAT on. Additionally, it is super comfortable. I'm excited to style it up with accessories because I think you could wear this so many ways. Perfect for an upcoming vacation. I'm going to purchase more colors.
Love the fit & just as pictured. Happy with this purchase.
Comfortable dress, fits well. Fabric is not too soft, but it it does not cling which is great. Size is perfect, I wear XL.
This was ok but I ended up returning because it was a little big and color was a lot darker than I thought. Soft material though and would be a good dress if you are pregnant and growing.
Good quality and very flattering

I bought this and fell in love with the fit. It was form-fitting and very flattering. I wore it out to an event, and by the end of the event, the dress was hanging below my bra. It was so embarrassing. Its stretch just continued to stretch the entire event. I literally had to hold it up on my chest by the end of the day. I returned this product. It's too bad because I had purchased it in multiple colors.

I purchased this dress for pregnancy and it is VERY stretchy, I probably could have sized down. I wasn't thrilled with how thin the dress was though, I felt it really showed every line and lump and was really only flattering in my third trimester when the bump was big. So maybe this was a sizing issue, I typically am a Large in most Amazon products and other brands (5'5", 160lbs pre-pregnancy, 180-190 in third trimester) but I think a medium would have been a better choice.
This fits horribly and is so heavy it cuts so low. It also picks so easily. I’m so upset I missed the return window and I am stuck with this waste of money.

it’s a very stretchy dress. I originally ordered a small and I noticed that stretch so exchanged it for extra small and the extra small still a little too stretchy but the material is really nice a lot more expensive than it is.
A little low under arms and very stretchy so I sized down for perfect fit. Comfy and beautiful
Thick knit material, very comfortable, hugs the body. Rich summer color. I love this dress, I’m gonna be wearing it all summer
Super cute,  nice casual dress or dress it up very functional! Ordered my normal size originally but returned it to get a size smaller.
I really love this dress. It’s comfortable, flattering and a nice material. I plan to buy another one! Very good value for the price.
Could have been cute but it was too big and the fabric was hard
Has more sheen than I expected and is thin enough to show imperfections (cellulite)

for me, I dont have any spectacular curves and found that this was way too heavy and would fall down on my body, leaving no curves to be observed. I returned and ordered a size smaller hoping that it would fit better, but it didn't work out. Same issues as before. Big shame because I think this is cute.

Color and material was great! However it laid goofy on my mid back, it kept bunching up. I’m unsure if it was the size or not. I’m going to try a smaller size and see if that helps because I really liked everything else about this dress. It was a good quality dress that you could style multiple ways.
Nice thick material but gets stretchy and sags with little to no form
Kept creeping down(chest) due to Weight of fabric

Dress is perfect for dressing up or dressing down for a more casual look. My only complaint is it was a bit big. I'm 138lbs and the small was too big. I would have liked a more fitted fit.  I normally wear a small/medium.
Sexy good quality goes perfect with my Tom Ford sunglasses

Not for me. The material was very thick and heavy.
Besides itchy material, this dress highlights every flaw!
Not sure how one can wear with undies on bc u can see everything in this dress, material is not soft at all

I’m a 40 yo mom and I like comfort. This dress is stretchy and flattering on my stomach that hasn’t been flat since Y2K. I don’t know how durable it is, but so far so good. I washed it a couple of times.I did size down as other reviewers recommended. I’m a 34D and was worried about it fitting around my chest, but it’s a non-issue.

This dress has a great fit! It’s form fitting, but not too snug. It’s very soft and stretchy, super comfortable! I have it in brown and navy and get so much wear out of them. Obviously a summer dress, but can also wear with a sweater over it or a jacket in cooler temps.
Love this dress, though it seams to run a tad large and a little sorter than show on pictures but I am 5'11 so that may be the reason. It is extremely comfy though.

Simple black tank dress, material is thick but not binding. Runs a little big, I'm usually a medium in things like this but the medium was too big. Small fits great and the dress can be dressed up or down.
It feels cheap quality 😔😔
Size down twice! It’s stretchy too don’t be afraid do go down more than one size.

This dress is cute but I felt that I needed shapewear underneath since it is very stretchy/not tightly fitted and I should have sized down since the bust area was a little loose on me and I am a D cup. I got a small, 135 pounds, 5 feet tall. Good length even though I am on the shorter side.
Best to wear strapless bra or boob covers. Comfy!

评论概述: wow, what's up with the good reviews?!?
评论详情: I was so excited for this dress in that good chocolate brown! But then I felt it. Oh. The material is ever so slightly ... scratchy? Not terrible, but feels like what it is- cheap poly. Not a good start, but I try it on. Hunh. The material is so heavy that gravity immediately begins to pull it towards the floor. I nudge it back up. Not bad. I pull it up again. Hmm, I'd spend the whole night tugging it back into place? Umm, that's not a good look to see a woman repeatedly pulling her dress up! ha. And it feels kinda itchy. Just no. Boo. Returning.
Very versatile - I can make a lot of outfits with this dress. Have fun coming up with cute styles!  This is very flattering and comfy.

This dress was cute but should definitely size down. I ordered a medium but could have used a small, Maybe even an extra small. Returned it though because it was loose and I didn’t like the way it fit

Im 5’6 115ish and ordered XS and S and ended keeping the small. They fit about the same but I wanted to leave a little room. Ignore the “Romy and Michele” dance moves lol I clearly was feelin myself that night in this dress. It was also perfect for Top Golf! Cute, casual and sooo comfortable!

I love this dress, it is perfect and form fitting in the correct size. However, like many other reviews said, it is heavy/stretchy material so it sags a bit. I ordered a small the first time but had to exchange it for a XXS. It was well worth the exchange because in the correct size, it’s beautiful! For size reference I am 5’9” and 135lbs and a XXS is perfect!
The fit was great and the price value is fantastic.

I didn't even bother trying this on, because the fabric is just that horrible, but that's my mistake for not checking the material first. It feels (and offgases) like plastic, nothing soft or "sweater" about it. If you have sensitive skin and/or tactile issues with fabrics, don't bother.

评论概述: green color is not even close to actual color
评论详情: The dress is great but I wanted this turquoise/teal color and the green is closer to kelly green..... not even close.

评论概述: These dresses DO NOT run big
评论详情: I ordered a bigger size in two dresses bc some reviews said it ran big. Amazon was unable to help me and would not let me reorder the dresses at the same price (prime day price). “They just don’t have the option to help”. So be careful with what you order because they will not exchange. Other than that the dresses are great quality and the fabric is a heavy fabric. It’s very stretchy so get your normal size or size down.

评论概述: Buy a size smaller than you usually wear

Great color … comfortable…. Fitted but not too clingy

Seriously, it's a staple in my closet now. It's a super stretchy knit, and it holds you in all the right places. The slit makes it cute and just a little sexy. This is my new LBD. Great to travel with too!

This dress is amazing. I struggled so hard to find a midi dress that would fit my petite figure (5'2", 115lbs) but the sizing on this is amazing! I ordered an XXS and it fit perfectly. It's super stretchy and the length is right below the knee on me, which is what I wanted. The material is good quality and thick, but also breathable for wearing in the summer. I ended up ordering in more colors. So worth the price, highly recommend!
The weight of the dress pulls the straps and makes them stretch out to where it is way too low cut.

Good quality but runs small
This is a go to dress for me now. Comfy, cute, easy to wear. Love it.
I was surprised that this had such high reviews since the white one was see thru. The material also seemed flimsy for the price point. Returned immediately.
I thought the cut and material would be comfortable in summer but it weighs a ton and is super thick synthetic. Save it for winter. It stretches so you could fit a sweater under on snowy days.
The fabric of this dress is too heavy. It weighs the dress down way too much and makes it uncomfortable to wear.  Already washed it so I can’t return. Bummed.

it is a great dress, a little bit too tick but it is good since it wont mark anything. great quality

Perfect springtime dress. It doesn’t show lines or body flaws.

I am 5'9", 34DD, weighing 145lbs... well I listened to the reviews and bought a size bigger... and the medium fit like a large... not fitted at all. The color was beautiful & the fabric was amazing... just huge.

I bought 2 of these, the bright blue and the hot pink. The colors are fabulous and so fun for summer! The fabric is really nice and not too thin. These are awesome for travel, running errands or a BBQ. Grab a denim jacket or sweater (think air conditioning) and you’re good from morning to evening!
Great dress! Comfortable and flattering

I realllly wanted to love this dress, but sadly will be returning because the sizing is off. I typically wear a Medium or sometimes Small, but after reading previous reviews, I hesitantly ordered this dress in orange in XS size, but my husband said it STILL looked too loose! I almost kept it anyways because I loved the cut and color, the weight of the material, and the ribbed look. But the material is just so stretchy (and also NOT the softest), it bunches up a little on the small of my back and is maybe a little too long for my height. I’m 5’3”, 135 lbs, 36C for reference. Debating whether I should try the XXS or not…

评论概述: My favorite dress at the moment!

Simple and flattering dress. One of those frocks you can throw on for a day out and about, transitioning easily, if need be, into dinner. Not snug, hangs beautifully. I'm 5'2" 135 lb...I got a medium. Could have gotten a small, but love how the medium hangs.

评论概述: Loved this so much Bought Two!!!

Great quality material. Looks more expensive in person

Such a lovely dress, has a great fit, it's super soft, very stretchy, looks very flattering to the body and has such great quality fabric. I loved this dress as soon as I tried it on, it just hugged my body and I feel like it popped out my curves nicely. It's great for many occasions, I highly recommend it. For Reference I'm 5'4 feet tall, 144lbs, 36D Chest, Ordered Size Small, Color Blue. It does run a bit bigger so if you prefer a more fitted fit, I would suggest sizing down. I'm normally medium size for clothing, but decided to order this one in "small" but it was a bit on the bigger side for me. The slit is on my left hand side and is super cute 😍 I will order another one in xs to see if I like it more since I love my dresses more fitted... Will update on it later. Here's an update with pictures of the blue dress. I really hope this was helpful😊  Update Aug 27, 2023: So I ordered an XS in this dress and it fit waay better than the small more fitted, so I'm guessing The Drop runs a bit big for this dress since normally I'm a medium to small. I ordered it in brown, pink and white ( I'll update again with more pics) but wow the colors are beautiful 😍 Just get your correct desired size and you should be good 😊👍
Beautiful dress for the summer.
Very thick feeling. It seemed ok, but would’ve been very hot to wear.
Great dress!  It sits a little low on the chest,  but I will be getting a lot of use out if this dress anyway.  Great quality and super comfortable.

These are so cute. I got a few colors. Little thick for summer but can make it work! It’s slightly heavy but a great material! I’m usually a medium but got a small. I’m 6 months pregnant too which goes to say they do run generous and are very stretchy!
Soft texture of the clothing.

Purchased in my typical size and the dress was way too big. As a bodycon item I expected this dress to hug and stretch around me. Unforutnaly, the dress was baggy (especially through the mid section) and, therefore, not at all flattering. I am so disappointed because the fabric was nice as thick, the dress was a perfect length, and the slit was high enough to make it easy to walk but not so high that you would ever have to worry.  Would recommend purchasing at least 1 size smaller than your usual.
